descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: CJ McCollum hauls in the dime from Jusuf Nurkic and drains the layup for the Trail Blazers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jusuf Nurkic makes a sweet dime) 2022/02/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jusuf Nurkic with the sweet dime to CJ McCollum for the bucket

videos.description: It's showtime in Portland as Greg Brown III glides through the paint and throws down the lob from CJ Elleby for the alley-oop.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (CJ Elleby makes a sweet dime) 2022/02/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: CJ Elleby lobs a beauty to Greg Brown for the fast-break alley-oop

videos.description: Greg Brown III drives into the paint and posterizes his defender to extend the Trail Blazers' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Greg Brown III gets up for the beautiful slam dunk) 2022/02/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Greg Brown puts his defender on a poster with this massive jam

videos.description: Jusuf Nurkic gathers the dime from CJ McCollum and throws down the jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Check out this sweet dime from CJ McCollum) 2022/02/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: CJ McCollum dimes Jusuf Nurkic for the flush

videos.description: Anfernee Simons takes the ball up the court and drills the 3-pointer to extend the Trail Blazers' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Anfernee Simons hits the 3 vs. Oklahoma City Thunder) 2022/02/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Anfernee Simons pulls up and drains the triple

videos.description: Anfernee Simons feeds Trendon Watford on the fast-break for the big-time jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trendon Watford throws down the hammer) 2022/02/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trendon Watford throws down the hammer on the fast break

videos.description: CJ McCollum pulls up and knocks down the deep 3-pointer to give the Trail Blazers the lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (CJ McCollum knocks down the triple) 2022/02/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: CJ McCollum lets it fly and drains the 3 from deep for the lead
